name: test_e2e_with_logs[269_CMD_FILE_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_FILE_003` |
| **Name** | Write to crontab |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | file_manipulation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; echo "* * * * * /tmp/evil.sh" >> /var/spool/cron/crontabs/root`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20echo%20%22*%20*%20*%20*%20*%20%2Ftmp%2Fevil.sh%22%20%3E%3E%20%2Fvar%2Fspool%2Fcron%2Fcrontabs%2Froot`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~22000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:26:30.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_FILE_003-1769351190723-7xhae pattern_id=CMD_FILE_003 uri=/?q=%3B%20echo%20%22*%20*%20*%20*%20*%20%2Ftmp%2Fevil.sh%22%20%3E%3E%20%2Fvar%2Fspool%2Fcron%2Fcrontabs%2Froot client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
